knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: We only teach facts so that everyone can think for themselves and form their own opinion. We draw a line between one and the other.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We make our technical solutions available in the open-source formula and value direct communication, which is why we keep most conversations in public.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: We work in a self-organizing way, where everyone can propose their own initiative, be responsible for its execution and unite other people around it.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the strength of the community and the benefits of belonging to a group. Decide what you want to get involved in and grow with us.
